dc_description_s: REMOTE DOWNLOAD NOT AVAILABLE - please contact data@library.columbia.edu for access. China County Boundaries With 2000 Population Census Data From 100% Short Form Data is a polygon theme representing counties in China.  Attribute information includes census data from 100% Short Form data from the 2000 China census.
dc_title_s: China County Boundaries With 2000 Population Census Data From 100% Short Form Data
dct_isPartOf_sm: Zhongguo 2000 nian xiang zhen ren kou pu cha zi liao yu di tu [electronic resource] = China 2000 township population census data with maps.
